mapper.select: select seq, name, brand, image, to_char(price, '999,999,999') as price, summary_desc, detail_desc , sub_image1 as subImage1 , sub_image2 as subImage2 , sub_image3 as subImage3 , sub_image4 as subImage4 from men_product_tbl2 where seq = #{seq}

select seq, name, to_char(price, '999,999,999,999') as price , image from (select seq, name, price, image, row_number() over(order by seq desc) as rNum from men_product_tbl2
) where rNum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} order by seq desc
select count(seq) from men_product_tbl2 where seq > 0
select product_seq ,name as optionName, wm_concat(value) as optionValue from option_tbl2 where product_seq = #{seq} group by name, product_seq
mapper.insert: insert into review_tbl2 values(review_sequence.nextVal, 'psy1234', #{seq} , '테스트 제목', #{content} , '4.1', sysDate, sysDate, 'n')
mapper.select: select m.nickname as nickName, r.content, r.score , r.reg_dt as regDt from review_tbl2 r, member_tbl2 m, order_tbl2 o where o.seq = r.order_seq and m.id = r.member_id and o.product_seq = #{seq}
